name: PASSENGER
description:
The game is simple. Drive a car and pick up your friend and send her to home.

BUT

The tough part  in this game is THERE ARE NO MAP only have some shitty ass JUMP SCARE and Enemy!

Are You have guts to finished this game?

This is Passengerz....[Early fucking prototype. Graphics is shit because Epic Blank doesn't have game artist anymore. Only left with one noob programmer.]

DO COMMENT FOR IMPROVEMENT. Thanks!
